description:
The One Eau De Parfum - Timeless Elegance in a Bottle

Experience the allure of Dolce & Gabbana The One, a captivating oriental floral perfume that embodies sophisticated femininity. This exquisite 100ml eau de parfum has established itself as a modern classic in the world of luxury fragrances, perfect for the woman who commands attention with her presence. âœ¨

The Essence of The One

Created by perfumer Christine Nagel, D&G The One was launched in 2006 and quickly became a bestselling fragrance worldwide. The composition is a masterful blend of warm, sensual notes that create an unforgettable signature scent. Each spray reveals a complex, sophisticated character that evolves beautifully throughout the day. ðŸŒ¸

Product Information
Size 100ml
Gender Women
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration Eau de Parfum (EDP)
Brand Dolce & Gabbana

A Symphony of Luxurious Notes

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Bergamot, Mandarin Orange, Lychee, Peach
Heart Notes Lily, Jasmine, Lily-of-the-Valley, Plum
Base Notes Vanilla, Amber, Musk, Vetiver

Key Features of The One EDP:

  • Long-lasting oriental floral fragrance with impressive sillage ðŸ’«
  • Warm, spicy vanilla base that creates a cozy, intimate aura ðŸ”¥
  • Versatile scent suitable for evening wear and special occasions
  • Luxurious gold-toned bottle design that embodies elegance
  • Part of the prestigious oriental fragrance collection

Dolce & Gabbana created The One for the woman who is both classic and contemporary â€“ a modern icon who knows exactly what she wants. This signature Dolce & Gabbana scent represents the ultimate in luxury and sophistication, making it a staple in any fragrance collection. ðŸ’Ž

The striking bottle design features elegant curves and a gleaming golden hue that perfectly captures the opulence of the fragrance within. As a new arrival to our collection, this 100ml size offers excellent value for a premium designer fragrance. ðŸŒ¿

Frequently Asked Question

How long does The One Eau de Parfum last on skin?

The One EDP offers impressive longevity, typically lasting 6-8 hours on most skin types. The vanilla and amber base notes create a lingering warmth that can be detected throughout the day. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and layer with matching body products from the line.
